about_the_game:
Dead Earth Zombies is a Top-Down Zombie survival in a sandbox world, you are free to follow the story or do your own thing.

At the moment the coop functionality is implemented but not active, this will be dependent on the success of the game.

Current Game Features:


Dynamic loot system based on location and current danger, the more zombies the better the loot.

Building system, create a base anywhere on in the world from, walls, floors and turrets as well as stash boxes to store loot.

Crafting System, almost all objects in the game can be crafted with the right materials.

Hunting system, the ability to also tame some animals.

Vehicles, there are plans for more types.

Perk system from health to better vision.

NPCs fighting the dead and you.

Planned Features:


Full graphic overhaul, the assets and graphics will go through stages of improvements.

Fully Scripted Main story and Site Missions.

Intractable NPC's who you can chat with, gain quests and hire.

Horde mode, survive against waves of increasing numbers and types of zombies for as long as possible.

Achievements.

name: Dead Earth Zombies

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+, macOS 10.12+, Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+, macOS 10.12+, Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Dead Earth is an open world survival game, choose what you want to do in this world, build a small base, hunt for food, survive and explore the open world, play the game your way, ohh... and try to stay off the menu.
